name: AFTER END
description:
AFTER END

It presents a fallen world in which today there are almost no survival resources left. As a result, people have to compete for the little resources that are left. both water mixed with dirt air pollution but still have enough synthetic food In which the story progresses, players will know that due to the expansion of the sun heating up. Up until the world had to be like this causing many living things to die. ice melts into water There have been many disasters, including typhoons and floods. Germs and pests grow rapidly. longer summer Falling seasons The night is many times longer than the day. withered tree sea creatures die Are natural resources scarce? Many crises come to humankind without thinking until the world finally collapses. The people who were left with only a handful of people began to adapt and live in a terrifying world of collapse.

Game Design

Puzzle Side Scrolling game is a puzzle solving in 2D perspective. The game focuses on telling the story of a fallen world. The 2D visual style looks dull.

Game Type

Puzzle

Platformer

Adventure

MAP Artbook : https://anyflip.com/ckpwe/odff/
